description: Demolition of existing rear lean to structure, erection of roof extension with side and rear dormer and installation of 1 no front rooflight to facilitate loft conversion. Internal alteration.
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition B.2 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed development would be in conflict with Condition B.2(c)(i) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended), as the proposed side windows would be obscure-glazed at lower half only.
